ai-ja334:1.2_0: if the bull goes off course,
ai-ja334:1.4_0: because their leader is off course.
ai-ja334:2.2_0: when the one agreed on as chief
ai-ja334:2.5_0: The whole of the country sleeps badly.
ai-ja334:3.3_0: All the other cows (also) go straight, being led by one who goes straight.
ai-ja334:4.2_0: when the one agreed on as chief
ai-ja334:4.5_0: The whole country sleeps at ease,
ai-ja334:5.1_0: The fourth section of the kingdom is finished.
